description:
Code takes a data file of input features of a set of digitized pulses and converts the file to three vectors describing a two-component Gaussian mixture model of the input pulses. 

These three vectors can then be applied mathematically to a set of input feature data of digitized pulses to 
generate soft-scores describing the likelihood of each pulse's membership in each of the two Gaussian modeled components. 

The operation of the code also displays graphics to the user for 
interpreting the output vectors and
distribution of the soft-scores of the input data.
name: PSD GMM Trainer
